sense.name: direct
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] CHANNEL NP2[theme[concrete]] NP1[theme] CHANNEL PP{P NP[location]} NP1[agent] CHANNEL NP2[theme[abstract]] (PP{to NP[experiencer]})
sense.examples: Metal channels heat very well. Heat channels through the catalyst material. Information brokers channel information to the target audience. The establishment media unquestioningly channeled the message.
